snippet.title: 2 Foxes and the Puzzling Forest Trailer
snippet.description:
2 Foxes and the Puzzling Forest is a single player puzzle game where you control 2 foxes in an isometric puzzle forest.  Push blocks, create paths, and even jump into foxholes to navigate your way through the puzzling forest and find your way towards the safe house!

Link to the Demo: https://summervillegamedev.itch.io/2-foxes-and-the-puzzling-forest

Expected Full Release: End of April/Early May 2021

Trailer Video Credit: Robert Gitau (https://www.linkedin.com/in/robert-gitau-8a3a1815b/)

Special thanks to Zygobot Studios and Full Sail University for helping bring this game to reality!
